bibdata.title: ASA American Standard for Relays Associated with Power Switchgear
ASA American Standard for Relays Associated with Power Switchgear

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard relates only to relays of types directly associated with power switchgear. It does not cover relays of types designed primarily for industrial control, excitation or governor regulating, telephone, telegraph, traffic signal, or similar purpose.

This standard relates only to relays of types directly associated with power switchgear. It does not cover relays of types designed primarily for industrial control, excitation or governor regulating, telephone, telegraph, traffic signal, or similar purpose.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
